## Data Cleaning

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("Arrest_Data_from_2020_to_Present.csv")
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- select(raw_data, -c(Neighborhood.Councils..Certified., 
                             Council.Districts,
                             LA.Specific.Plans,
                             Precinct.Boundaries,
                             Time,
                             Census.Tracts,
                             Booking.Time))
head(data)
```
